participant_1.name: Kayla
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a passion for music and nature.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is rascal flats. we spent summers ring at national parks. i grew up in the industry. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and reflective, with a deep appreciation for education and community service.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: I am sorry to hear that. what do you like to do for fun?
